title: How to Remove Stickers from WhatsApp Gallery and Favorites

steps.title: Navigate to a chat.
steps.content: Navigate to a chat. You must have a chat open to access the sticker menu. If you want to keep the sticker but remove it from your Recent section, skip to the next section instead .

steps.title: Tap the sticker icon.
steps.content: Tap the sticker icon. You can find this near the emojis icon . On Android, tap the smiley icon first. Then, tap the sticker icon.

steps.title: Tap the sticker icon with a "+".
steps.content: Tap the sticker icon with a "+". You can find this on the right side of the sticker menu. [1] X Research source A new page will open with your stickers, both downloaded and created.

steps.title: Tap My stickers.
steps.content: Tap My stickers . This is the second tab at the top.

steps.title: Tap the trash can icon.
steps.content: Tap the trash can icon. This will be next to the sticker pack you want to delete. On iPhone, tap Edit in the top-right corner. Tap - , and then tap Delete .

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . The sticker pack will be deleted. On Android, this will be Remove .

steps.title: Navigate to a chat.
steps.content: Navigate to a chat. You must have a chat open to access the sticker menu.

steps.title: Tap the sticker icon.
steps.content: Tap the sticker icon. This is near the text field when you're in a chat.

steps.title: Tap and hold the sticker you want to remove.
steps.content: Tap and hold the sticker you want to remove. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Remove.
steps.content: Tap Remove . The sticker will be removed from your Recent section.
